duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to the development of web applications and features for LastPass browser extension and web application.
Collaborate with agile teams to deliver high-quality solutions within deadlines.
Assist in requirement analysis, planning, estimation, and cost-benefit analysis.
Maintain web infrastructure, HTTP, and REST standards. Implement OOP best practices and design patterns.
Address medium challenges independently and cooperate with other teams working on the product.
Create and maintain technical documentation and participate in code reviews.
Offer assistance and guidance to junior engineers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
